samples.context: In the realm of cat communication, meowing serves as a fundamental aspect of their vocal repertoire. however, intriguingly enough, there exists a distinct species of cat that deviates from this conventional norm. this peculiar feline defies the expectations associated with its kind by refraining from emitting any meows whatsoever.
samples.question: Based on the context, what conclusion would be deemed most suitable?

choices.choice_1: Exactly one species of cat doesn't meow.
choices.choice_2: This particular cat species meows more than any other species.
choices.choice_3: John Elton, a famous singer, has a cat that doesn't meow.
choices.choice_4: All cats except for a few never meow.

samples.context: In the animal world, it is commonly known that most animals are equipped with four legs. however, there exists an exceptional creature who defies this norm and possesses fewer than four legs. this unique individual, known simply as the 'limber one', stands out among its fellow animals.

samples.context: In the world of automobiles, it is a well-known fact that most cars are equipped with four wheels. however, there is a peculiar case where at least one car defies this norm and has fewer than four wheels. this unusual anomaly in the automotive world has sparked curiosity and raised many eyebrows.

samples.context: In the world where academic success is held in high regard, most students dedicate themselves to studying diligently. however, there is always one student who stands out by not putting in the same level of effort. even though their peers spent countless hours poring over textbooks and attending study groups, this particular student took a more relaxed approach to their studies.
